title: Germans are installing “plug-and-play” solar panels to feed energy back to the...
content:
Germans are installing “plug-and-play” solar panels to feed energy back to the grid. “You don’t need to drill or hammer anything. You just hang them from the balcony like wet laundry.” Collectively, they are contributing significantly to solar capacity.

author: Jason Kottke
